features: Keyboard accessibility with arrow keys and Home/End
Fine control with Shift key modifier (10x step)

keyboard_interactions.comment: When focus is on the handle and orientation is horizontal, decreases the size of the previous panel and increases the size of the next panel
When focus is on the handle and orientation is horizontal, increases the size of the previous panel and decreases the size of the next panel
When focus is on the handle and orientation is vertical, decreases the size of the previous panel and increases the size of the next panel
When focus is on the handle and orientation is vertical, increases the size of the previous panel and decreases the size of the next panel
When focus is on the handle, increases the resizing step to 10% (default step is 1%)
When focus is on the handle, collapses the previous panel to its minimum size
When focus is on the handle, expands the previous panel to its maximum size while respecting the next panel's minimum size
